page.syntax: Info as P = httpd_settings_get([L from_memory [,L CreateMissingConfigfile ]])
page.discussion: The HTTPD_SETTINGS_GET() function loads the Application Server settings. Limitations: Desktop applications only. Internal use only.
page.example: ? HTTPD_SETTINGS_GET() = A5W_PageExtension = ".a5w" access_log = "C:\Program Files\A5V8\a5w_access.log" AllowDenyIP = "Deny" AllowDirBrowse = 0 autostart = "0" ...
